# HKFHIRVersion

**Class**

The FHIR version.

## Declaration

```swift
class HKFHIRVersion
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFHIRVersion] instance to represent the version of the Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) standard used to create a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFHIRResource] sample.

## Creating Version Objects

- **init(fromVersionString:)**: Creates an FHIR version object from a string representation of the version.
- **primaryDSTU2()**: Returns the primary Second Draft Standard for Trial Use (DSTU2) version.
- **primaryR4()**: Returns the primary Release 4 (R4) version.

## Accessing Version Data

- **majorVersion**: The standard’s major version number.
- **minorVersion**: The standard’s minor version number.
- **patchVersion**: The standard’s patch version number.
- **stringRepresentation**: A string representation of the version.

## Accessing the Release

- **fhirRelease**: An official release of the FHIR specification.
- **HKFHIRRelease**: Official releases of the FHIR specification.

## Accessing FHIR Data

- **identifier**: The value from the FHIR resource’s `id` field.
- **fhirVersion**: The FHIR version used by this resource.
- **resourceType**: The value from the FHIR resource’s `resourceType` field.
- **HKFHIRResourceType**: The FHIR resource types supported in HealthKit.
- **sourceURL**: The full URL for the source of the FHIR resource.
- **data**: The JSON representation of the FHIR resource.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
